1188780.name: Border Force: Space Force DLC
1188780.description:
Border Force: Space Force


When it comes to space, too often, for too many years, our dreams of exploration and discovery were really squandered by politics and bureaucracy...

The year is 2050. How did you get here? What happened in Mexico?

The trivial borders between countries and continents no longer matter. What matters now is the greatest border wall of all. The border between the Earth and what lies beyond.

Space Features


  • A brand new 8 day campaign set in space - with no gravity!
  • A new multiplayer map set in space that can be played in co-op or competitive - also with no gravity!
  • New contraband!
  • New achievements!
  • Space vans! Space cars!
  • A space freighter!
  • Thrusters, thrusters and more thrusters!
  • And more!

Make Earth safe again..
1188780.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
